image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace – Premium web design for Swiss tourism companies – Feel & Flow
image:image.image:caption: Emotions first - discover by immersionMany people are not familiar with the fascinating Segway experience. This variant conveys the emotions with moving images, videos and scroll-based sections on a dark background that create curiosity and atmosphere. Only then do the tour finder and booking follow.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace – Premium web design for Swiss tourism companies – Explore & Book
image:image.image:caption: Focus on conversion - straight to the experience It relies on tried-and-tested features and guides visitors quickly to the experience. Inspired by platforms such as Airbnb, it uses a lean, conversion-optimized layout. Diverse tours speak for themselves, supported by emotional videos that arouse curiosity. Featured tours, a tour finder and a calendar provide an immediate overview and orientation. The emotional part follows and underlines the experience.

image:image.image:caption: This is the most important "button" in the Squarespace CMS. But before you press it, it is important to carry out the following steps carefully.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Get your new Squarespace website online - The ultimate go-live checklist! - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: A favicon is often forgotten - this leads to the standard Squarespace logo appearing on your website. This looks very unprofessional.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Get your new Squarespace website online - The ultimate go-live checklist! - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: For new Squarespace 7.1 websites, the mobile layout of the page can - no, must - be checked. It is simple, but is quickly forgotten. A blue symbol in the smartphone view shows that new elements have not yet been checked.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Get your new Squarespace website online - The ultimate go-live checklist! - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: It is advisable to have the data protection guidelines checked by a lawyer. Especially for larger websites.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Get your new Squarespace website online - The ultimate go-live checklist! - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: Redirect old URLs! When switching from an old website to a new one, this step is often forgotten by non-experts. However, it is crucial for a successful relaunch without losing valuable Google rankings.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Get your new Squarespace website online - The ultimate go-live checklist! - Make it stand out

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Best alternative to WordPress 2025 - For Swiss SMEs - Not quite convinced yet? Or ready to go!
image:image.image:caption: Still not completely convinced? We understand that. The myth of the "unlimited possibilities" of WordPress is persistent. Perhaps you're wondering whether such an elegant platform is really up to your specific requirements. In a no-obligation consultation, we will show you specifically how we create solutions for demanding SMEs that go far beyond the standard.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: Whatever it is, the way you tell your story online can make all the difference.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: "Geerdete": A very approachable and authentic design that emphasizes the family atmosphere and the down-to-earth nature of Weinbau Wetli.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: "Auserlesen": An elegant and high-quality design that emphasizes the excellence and award-winning quality of Wetli wines.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Customized filters and markups
image:image.image:caption: For the online store, we developed an individual filter function according to grape variety, award and availability. This allows customers to find the right wine quickly. Availability is shown by an intuitive bottle symbol (empty, half full, full) - a customized extension. Using Squarespace categories, we created a central award management system so that the Wetli family can easily maintain awards that automatically appear in the overall list and on product pages.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Advanced product characteristics and individual checkout process with order on account
image:image.image:caption: We developed a customized checkout process for orders on account - a function not offered by Squarespace as standard. We also created a clear table with icons for dishes, ageing and drinking temperature to show customers all the important information at a glance.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional website for winery on Lake Zurich - Make it stand out
image:image.image:caption: This is how good the new winegrowing website looks:

image:image.image:caption: Let's talk in person about your goals and how we can help you achieve them. Book your non-binding online appointment now.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Modern brand and web design for Rrevival® - First Class
image:image.image:caption: First Class combines timeless elegance with courage and warmth. Bright colors, a concise serif font for headlines and clear sans serifs for texts create trust and clarity. The visual language focuses on humanity, growth and positive change and emphasizes the dynamic, future-oriented character of the brand.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Modern brand and web design for Rrevival® - Pathfinder
image:image.image:caption: Pathfinder combines bold contrasts with clear, straightforward headlines. Dark and light sections create dynamism, while a thin, condensed sans-serif font for headlines is complemented by a matching non-condensed variant. The visual language combines performance with security and radiates strength and reliability.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Professional Squarespace website for Zurich security company - The Futuristic
image:image.image:caption: Goes for a striking and modern style. It uses dark tones and neon-lit accents with the Abel and Source Code Pro fonts to create a progressive and technology-oriented, slightly playful atmosphere.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Modern web design for innovative dental technicians: The Vogel Dental project - Design 1 - Classic. Fresh.
image:image.image:caption: emotional - individual - modern This design represents a combination of modern clarity and individual craftsmanship. The unique selling point of this design is the harmonious combination of contemporary aesthetics with a sense of quality craftsmanship and emotion.

image:image.image:title: Website tips for Swiss companies & Squarespace - Modern web design for innovative dental technicians: The Vogel Dental project - Design 2 - Dynamic. Cheeky.
image:image.image:caption: With this design, the focus is on inviting dynamism and professionalism. The color palette is fresh and energetic, underlining the innovative strength and future orientation. The fonts here are deliberately straightforward and based on the logo to convey competence and expertise. The design is characterized by a dynamic layout that leads the eye across the page and arouses interest.
